duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in preparation of capital/operating forecasts/budgets, account and trend analysis, and reporting focused on the supported Departments/Business Unit(s).
Provide actionable insights around trends, financial performance and utilize analytical and modeling capability to perform scenario and sensitivity analysis to enhance decision making.
Measure key performance indicators and benchmarking results across accounts, markets, business units, and channels.
Create and/or review financial models with 'what if' scenarios to help future business planning decisions and assist in communicating recommendations to senior management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree Finance, Business Administration, Management, Accounting, Economics, Engineering (Required)
